class_d_08_language_01:
Aujourd’hui—today—we take our final exam!
Détendez-vous—relax, that is—and do your best![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_08_language_02: Êtes-vous prêts—are you ready?! Let’s begin![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_08_question_01:
1. Which of the following means “delicious”?

A) Gracias
B) Délicieux
C) Merci
class_d_08_question_02:
2. What do these two foreign phrases mean?
    Je t’aime! Ich liebe dich!

A) Time to eat
B) I love you
C) I’m going home
class_d_08_question_03:
3. Based on what you just heard, what emotion
    do you think Pikachu was expressing?

A) Happiness
B) Anger
C) Sadness
class_d_08_question_04:
4. Based on what you just heard, what emotion
    do you think Pikachu was expressing?

A) Happiness
B) Anger
C) Sadness
class_d_08_question_05:
5. What is your beloved teacher’s name?

A) Amador
B) Labrador
C) Isadore
D) Salvatore
class_d_08_language_03:
C’est fini! Time is up! Posez vos stylos—put down
your pens, that is![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_08_language_04:
I assume the obligatory dernière question—last
question, that is—gave you no trouble![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_08_language_05:
I’m sure you all did great! Bravo, my friends! You
can get your scores at the school’s front desk![VAR 0114(0026)]
